activities: Scentsy collects personal information to fulfill customer orders, enroll people to become independent contractors with the intended purpose of distributing our product.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Information obtained from customers or contracted distributors is processed by our organization. The majority of information is processed electronically with some information being viewable by restricted persons within the organization.
